title: Geometry Wars: Retro Evolved
notes: Game defaults to 640x480 on fullscreen, crashes if resolution is changed. Windowed mode doesn't have any issues when resized.

title: Geometry Wars: Retro Evolved
notes: Starts in 640x480, crashes on resolution change but resolution can be set via config file: ~/.steam/steam/steamapps/compatdata/8400/pfx/drive_c/users/steamuser/Local Settings/Application Data/Bizarre Creations/Geometry Wars Retro Evolved/config.xml

It crashes if you attempt to change the resolution while in fullscreen, but doesn't crash if windowed.  So, start it, L-Alt+Enter to switch to a window, change to your preferred resolution, then quit and restart.  Should run fine afterward.
title: Geometry Wars: Retro Evolved

cpu: AMD A10-4600M APU with Radeon(tm) HD Graphics

title: Geometry Wars: Retro Evolved

gpu: NVIDIA Corporation GeForce GTX 1070 With Max-Q Design/PCIe/SSE2
notes:
As has been stated by others, runs great except for changing resolution while in fullscreen mode. 

Just switch to windowed in the settings, set the resolution and change it back to fullscreen and you're good to go. Everything else works flawlessly and at fantastic framerates.
title: Geometry Wars: Retro Evolved

notes: Have to change resolution within game files, if you try within the game it will crash. otherwise runs perfectly
title: Geometry Wars: Retro Evolved
